course_title: Special Topics: Human Health: Drug Discovery
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 30 / Seats Avail: 2Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Drug discovery will be explored across bench to bedside discovery processes. We will learn about small molecule synthesis, repurposing of existing agents, preclinical validation, and the pathway to human studies and eventual FDA approval.
course_description: Seminar of lecture series of topics in human health. May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Credit varies from one to four hours.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Emerson Chemistry Bldg. E102
sections: Class Nbr: 3524, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: Gavegnano/Reece, Status: Open
